page.title: 10A BUTTERLEIGH FARM
page.content: They came here in 1962.When they arrived it was old and battered. When they came here the top storey was used for keeping chickens and all; the mess was thrown down a shute into a pit. There has been a settlement there for hundreds of years but the present farm was rebuilt in 1752. The farm was once used for holding smuggled goods from France and people used to come there and buy the goods on a {Black Market} system. { Since the owners have been there they have had many difficult winters,the worst of which was 1962-1963 when they were snowed in for 13 weeks and the water supply was cut off.
